item.title: Awesome psql tips
item.description: Today I learned about psql-tips.org by LÃ¦titia Avrot, an excellent repository of psql (the CLI tool, not the database itself) tips. I like how one randomized tip is playfully served on the home page while the complete list is always at hand. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow me on Mastodon
